articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Germany's Lufthansa said on Wednesday it suspended flights to Tehran because of the situation in the Middle East, where the region is on alert for possible Iranian retaliation over a suspected Israeli air strike on Iran's embassy in Syria.
articles.title: Lufthansa suspends Tehran flights, Middle East on alert for potential Iran attacks
